Dan Kelley's blog

In late 2013, Dan Kelley (for other pages click here) started experimenting with blogging, creating a WordPress blog. Finding the WordPress data entry scheme being somewhat arduous, and disliking the lock-in to a commercial site, he started experimenting with github blogging in early 2014, yielding the entries provided below. (The source for the blog is at github.)
